segments.text: Good morning , sir . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to buy a ticket to Sydney tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right now fight BW159 is the only one available , it is a non-direct one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It departs at 4:40 pm tomorrow and arrives in Sydney at 10:20 am . the next morning by way of Melboume .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long is the layover in Melboume ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: About 1 hour . Would you buy it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I want a first class single ticket .
segments.speaker: S2
